StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetCandidateStatus]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SSN as varchar(9) AS
SELECT PERSON.PERSON_ID, CANDIDATE_STATUS.STATUS_CODE, CANDIDATE_STATUS.DISPOSITION_CODE FROM PERSON, NWA, CANDIDATE_STATUS WHERE PERSON.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN AND PERSON.PERSON_ID = NWA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND CANDIDATE_STATUS.NWA_ID = NWA.NWA_ID AND CANDIDATE_STATUS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE = ( SELECT MAX(STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE) FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS WHERE CANDIDATE_STATUS.NWA_ID = NWA.NWA_ID ) AND CANDIDATE_STATUS.DISPOSITION_CODE = (SELECT MAX(CS.DISPOSITION_CODE) FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS CS WHERE NWA.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE = (SELECT MAX(CS.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE) FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS CS WHERE NWA.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID))
